Competition's metric is MAE, so if we submit 0 predictions we can get target mean of public part.

$MAE = \frac{\sum_{i=0}^{N}|y_{i} - pred_{i}|}{n}$

$\frac{\sum_{i=0}^{N}|y_{i} - 0|}{n} = \frac{\sum_{i=0}^{N}|y_{i}|}{n}$
